results.title: Metformin Protects against Radiation-Induced Acute Effects by Limiting Senescence of Bronchial-Epithelial Cells
results.text_hl: ...The impact of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ treatment on radiation-induced senescence in normal lung tissue was investigated using our @SPECIES_10090 @@@mouse@@@ model of radiation-induced @<m>DISEASE_Carrington_syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C535590 @@@pneumopathy@@@ (Figure 1).
